_meta.description: Custom user agents used by our native apps that override the default user-agent string. omitApplicationSites and omitVersionSites follow standard exception format.

sampleExcludeRecords.reason: Site doesn't recognize our user agent and blocks user from logging in.

omitApplicationSites.reason: Site loads blank and does not proceed.
Homepage UI elements appear squashed together, preventing interaction with the site.
Site refuses to redirect to the native app.
